title: ChatGPT in Code Engineering Projects: Security and Compliance

courseOutline.title: ChatGPT in Code Engineering Projects: Security and Compliance
courseOutline.description: This course aims to provide code engineers with an understanding of how to use ChatGPT effectively in their projects while ensuring security and compliance.
courseOutline.goal: Understand the appropriate usage scenarios for ChatGPT in code engineering projects to ensure security and compliance.

sections.title: Overview of ChatGPT
sections.description: An introduction to what ChatGPT is and its capabilities.

sections.title: Benefits in Code Engineering Projects
sections.description: Exploring how ChatGPT can be beneficial in various code engineering projects.

sections.title: Identifying Security Risks
sections.description: Understanding common security risks associated with integrating ChatGPT into code engineering projects.

sections.title: Mitigation Strategies
sections.description: Strategies to mitigate these identified risks and ensure a secure integration of ChatGPT.

sections.title: Legal Compliance Overview
sections.description: An overview of legal compliance requirements that must be considered when using ChatGPT.

sections.title: Ensuring Compliance
sections.description: Steps and guidelines to ensure that the use of ChatGPT complies with relevant laws and regulations.

sections.title: Best Practices for Integration
sections.description: Guidelines on how to integrate ChatGPT into code engineering projects effectively while maintaining security and compliance standards.
